alert.note: Alert for Berrien; Cook; Lowndes (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 20 at 6:58PM EDT until August 20 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Cook County in south central Georgia... South central Berrien County in south central Georgia... North central Lowndes County in south central Georgia... * Until 745 PM EDT. * At 658 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Ray City, or 11 miles north of Valdosta, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Nashville, Adel, Hahira, Sparks, Ray City, Cecil, Cottle, Berrien Co A/P, Barretts, New Lois, Massee, I-75 At Exit 29, Allenville, Weber and Laconte. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
